phrases.original: Have you forgotten your password? No problem! You can reset it.
phrases.translated: Have you forgotten your password? No problem! You can reset it.

phrases.original: Simply input your e-mail address below. We will send you a message containing a special link. In order to reset your password, you must click on that link.
phrases.translated: Simply input your e-mail address below. We will send you a message containing a special link. In order to reset your password, you must click on that link.

phrases.original: Please check your e-mail address for accuracy.
phrases.translated: Please check your e-mail address for accuracy.

phrases.original: This message is for ${firstname} ${lastname}. We just received your request to reset your password.  To do so, please click on the link below within 20 minutes of your request.
phrases.translated: This message is for ${firstname} ${lastname}. We just received your request to reset your password.  To do so, please click on the link below within 20 minutes of your request.

phrases.original: Please check your e-mail.  We have sent you a message containing a special link.  In order to reset your password, you must click on that link.
phrases.translated: Please check your e-mail.  We have sent you a message containing a special link.  In order to reset your password, you must click on that link.

changes.original: you must click on that link.
changes.translated: you must click on that link.

phrases.original: We have no record of this e-mail address. Did you use a different one when you registered?
phrases.translated: We have no record of this e-mail address. Did you use a different one when you registered?

phrases.original: There was a technical glitch preventing us from processing your request.  Please make sure that you are connected to the internet, then try again.
phrases.translated: There was a technical glitch preventing us from processing your request.  Please make sure that you are connected to the internet, then try again.
